00026    * Default constructor (for unit testing).
00027    */
00028    PairPotential::PairPotential()
00029     : skin_(0.0),
00030       cutoff_(0.0),
00031       pairCapacity_(0),
00032       domainPtr_(0),
00033       boundaryPtr_(0),
00034       storagePtr_(0),
00035       timer_(PairPotential::NTime)
00036    {}

00039    * Constructor.

00041    PairPotential::PairPotential(Simulation& simulation)
00042     : skin_(0.0),
00043       cutoff_(0.0),
00044       pairCapacity_(0),
00045       domainPtr_(&simulation.domain()),
00046       boundaryPtr_(&simulation.boundary()),
00047       storagePtr_(&simulation.atomStorage()),
00048       timer_(PairPotential::NTime)
00049    {}

00051    /*
00052    * Associate with related objects. (for unit testing).
00053    */
00054    void PairPotential::associate(Domain& domain, Boundary& boundary, 
00055                                  AtomStorage& storage)
00056    {
00057       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00058       boundaryPtr_ = &boundary;
00059       storagePtr_ = &storage;

00068    void PairPotential::readPairListParam(std::istream& in)
00069    {
00070       read<double>(in, "skin", skin_);
00071       read<int>(in, "pairCapacity", pairCapacity_);
00072       read<Boundary>(in, "maxBoundary", maxBoundary_);
00073 
00074       // Set upper and lower bound of the processor domain.
00075       boundary().setLengths(maxBoundary_.lengths());
00076       Vector lower;
00077       Vector upper;
00078       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00079          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00080          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00081       }
00082 
00083       // Allocate CellList and PairList
00084       int atomCapacity = storage().atomCapacity() + storage().atomCapacity();
00085       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin_;
00086       cellList_.allocate(atomCapacity, lower, upper, cutoff_);
00087       pairList_.allocate(atomCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00088    }
00089 
00090    /*
00091    * Allocate memory for the cell list.
00092    */
00093    void PairPotential::initialize(const Vector& lower, const Vector& upper, 
00094                                 double skin, int pairCapacity)
00095    {
00096       skin_ = skin;
00097       pairCapacity_ = pairCapacity;
00098 
00099       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin;
00100       int atomCapacity = storage().atomCapacity();
00101 
00102       cellList_.allocate(atomCapacity, lower, upper, cutoff_);
00103       pairList_.allocate(atomCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00104    }
00105 
00106    /*
00107    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00108    */
00109    void PairPotential::findNeighbors(const Vector& lower, const Vector& upper)
00110    {
00111       stamp(PairPotential::START);
00112 
00113       cellList_.makeGrid(lower, upper, cutoff_);
00114       cellList_.clear();
00115      
00116       // Add all atoms to the cell list. 
00117       AtomIterator atomIter;
00118       storage().begin(atomIter);
00119       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00120          cellList_.placeAtom(*atomIter);
00121       }
00122 
00123       // Add all ghosts to the cell list. 
00124       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00125       storage().begin(ghostIter);
00126       for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00127          cellList_.placeAtom(*ghostIter);
00128       }
00129 
00130       cellList_.build();
00131       assert(cellList_.isValid());
00132       assert(cellList_.nAtom() + cellList_.nReject() == storage().nAtom() + storage().nGhost());
00133       stamp(PairPotential::BUILD_CELL_LIST);
00134 
00135       pairList_.build(cellList_);
00136       stamp(PairPotential::BUILD_PAIR_LIST);
00137    }
00138 
00139    /*
00140    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00141    */
00142    void PairPotential::findNeighbors()
00143    {
00144       // Make the cell list grid.
00145       Vector lower;
00146       Vector upper;
00147       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00148          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00149          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00150       }
00151       findNeighbors(lower, upper);
00152    }
